context: Global aerospace company evaluating deployment of next-generation Earth observation satellite constellation to expand market share in commercial imaging services

request.purpose: Deploy 24-satellite constellation for high-resolution Earth imaging and data analytics services
request.justification: Market opportunity in $12B commercial imaging sector, 35% CAGR expected, current market share only 8%

decision_process.outcome: Technical requirements validated, proceeding to financial analysis
Strong market demand confirmed, $2.8B revenue potential over 10 years
Positive NPV of $180M, IRR of 14%, acceptable risk profile
All regulatory approvals secured, deployment authorized

business_impact.expected_outcome: Establish leadership in commercial satellite imaging, 25% market share within 5 years
business_impact.roi_timeline: Payback in 7 years, positive cash flow from year 3

outcome_tracking.6_month_review: 8 satellites deployed, initial revenue $45M, technical performance exceeding expectations
outcome_tracking.12_month_review: 16 satellites operational, revenue $120M, market share increased to 12%

lessons_learned: Early regulatory engagement critical for timeline acceleration, modular design enabled faster deployment than planned, customer co-development improved market acceptance
